segments.text: Dora , are you interested in going to the museum with me tomorrow ? I read the newspaper this morning . I know there is an art exhibition in Taipei Modern Art Museum .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I am free tomorrow . It sounds interesting to me . Can we buy the ticket online ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . I think we had better go there earlier , or we may have to spend a lot of time waiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess that is the thing we can do with we really want to visit the museum .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the ticket booth in the center . There seems to be not as many people as we thought it would be .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . We are lucky . Let's go buy the tickets first . We can have breakfast later . I am so hungry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( After the breakfast ) Which floor is the art exhibition we are going to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea . Let me take a closer look at my museum map
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , take your time . We have a whole day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on the 2nd floor . We are going to see some beautiful paintings about the history of ancient Greece .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at the museum guide.It says there are also some sculptures and potteries in this area . Let's rent an audio guide .
segments.speaker: S2
